name: Hood's Men Leather Jacket
description: The Hood's Men Leather Jacket is a stylish and durable outerwear option, crafted from high-quality leather.

description: The Lymio Casual Shirt for Men is a versatile and comfortable shirt perfect for everyday wear. It is made from breathable fabric, comes in a variety of colors and patterns

description: The Ada Fashion Trendy Handbag is a chic and practical accessory for women. It offers ample storage space with multiple compartments.

description: The Hub Motor Turbo Pro Bike is a high-performance electric bike designed for speed and efficiency. It features a powerful hub motor.

description: The HP Wired Mouse is a reliable and responsive input device, perfect for everyday computer use. It features a comfortable ergonomic design, precise optical tracking.

description: The Apple MacBook Air MD711HN/B is a lightweight and portable laptop with a sleek aluminum design.

description: The Orient Electric Ceiling Fan is a reliable and efficient cooling solution for your home. It features a powerful motor, aerodynamic blades for better air circulation.

description: The OnePlus 12R is a powerful smartphone with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage. It features a high-resolution display, advanced camera system, fast processor.

name: MRF Cricket Bat
description: The MRF Cricket Bat is crafted for performance and durability, used by professional cricketers. It features high-quality willow.
